IIT Kharagpur Quiz Club shared Technology Students' Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur's post. Technology Students' Gymkhana is organising OPEN IIT QUIZ on 21st October 2017. Max. Team Size: 4 Timings : 1.45 PM onwards Register here : tinyurl.com/openiitquiz Venue will be notified later.

Challenges are what make life interesting and
Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.                                            – Joshua J. Marine

So prepare yourselves to be challenged, excited and inspired as the Marketing and Advertisement Club of VGSOM presents, “Venalicium 2017”, the flagship pan-IIT business quiz. Brace yourselves as you embark upon this exciting journey where you put your business acumen to test. Participate in huge numbers and stand a chance to win exciting cash prizes worth ₹8000 at OUR KGP.... Hurry!

Stay up to date on the most effective business trends and register on the link below to participate: https://goo.gl/dBmstS
Online Round: 15th October, 09:00 PM

Last night, we witnessed a huge participation in the Quiz Session #5 of over 40 people and we hope this momentum continues as we conduct more sessions in the upcoming days.

All the first time participants who had provided their email-ids in the sheet have been sent invitations to the Googlegroup. Do get back to us if you took part and yet have not received an invitation. 
We are also maintaining an internal leaderboard for this session currently up to date till Quiz #5 which will be shared on the googlegroup.

See you all soon!

Hey everyone!
After a long hiatus, we convene again for another battle in our ancient war against the '?'
In simpler terms of surrender for the uninitiated, quiz club meets again after a hiatus tonight at 10 PM in V4.

The weapons in use are your paper shield and your pen.
The first battlefield of this night is Technology.
QM: Anshul Roy, IIT Kanpur
After that, the battlefield shall change to the world of Meme's or Maymays as it has come to be known by the normies on this hip social media site.
Q.M: A long time veteran and aspiring for knighthood in this field, Memelord-in-training, Piyush Kedia

message: IIT Kharagpur Quiz Club shared The Scholars' Avenue's post. The NSSC space quiz took place today at Vikramshila. The quizmaster for the event was Mr Somnath Chanda, a well-known name in Kolkata quizzing circles. It was his first quiz in IIT KGP and it lived up to expectations with a close finish. The final standings are as follows: Winners: Amit Kumar Ram, Ashutosh Dwivedi, Mayank Roy (120 points) Runners-Up: Baibhab Pattnaik, Judhajeet Basu, Siddhant (114 points) Second runners-up: Rishabh Madan, Sourav Kundu, Venkatesh Pai (84 points) TSA congratulates the winners. We also congratulate the KGP quizzing contingent for their remarkable performances in recent quizzes and hope they cap it off with a strong showing in Nihilanth, the inter IIT and IIM quizzing fest.

The GGSO Quiz witnessed a wonderful turnout and participation from all the teams.

The IIT Kharagpur Quiz Club congratulates the winners of the quiz and we look forward to yet another great quizzing season when we meet after the summer.

Till then, Happy Quizzing! :D

1st - Deepak Vasman, Siddhanth Dhargalkar, Shankar Goyal
2nd - Shubham Kumar, Harsh Agarwal, Abhimanyu Bharade
3rd - Abhishek Bose, Abhinav Jha, Venkatesh Jaiswal

The Quiz Club,VGSoM is hosting its flagship quiz event Quizzario. The questions will be in relevance to the general quizzing ability of an individual.

Round 1:Written round, which will also be an elimination round, at VGSoM building.
Round 2: Top 6 teams will be shortlisted for the final round to be held immediately after the prelims.

Rules
Team should comprise of 2 individuals from the same department.
Only students enrolled in IIT Kharagpur, India are eligible
Prelims start at 2 pm, 25th March 2017.
A student cannot be part of more than one team
In case of any dispute, the decisions of VGSoM Quiz Club shall be binding
The format and rules of events are subject to change before the start of the event
Decisions by quizmaster and Quiz Club would be final and binding
There is no limit to the number of teams participating from a department.

Prizes worth INR 4.5k to be won!!

Registration Link : https://goo.gl/forms/BKrmGFp8hxeAD9fj1
On the spot registration is also available
